

Filename:                            Function


"ASG Notes Ver-1.1.doc"            Mathematical Derivations

"AnalyticSignalGenerator.mcd"      MathCAD code

QuadFilterCoeffs_Turner_test.m:	   MATLAB Main routine for testing.  
                                   Run this first.
QuadFilterCoeffs_Turner.m          MATLAB: Generates complex filter's coefficients. 

QuadFilterCoeffs_Turner_plots.m	   MATLAB: Generates complex filter's coefficients 
                                   plus many plots showing the performance
                                   of the filters.
